entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as sending an owl back the next morning. He is also mentioned as writing a letter to Harry in the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as walking off into the forest with Viktor Krum and is warned by Sirius about being in danger.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as someone Harry walked off into the forest with.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as receiving a copy of the Daily Prophet and reading it with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as reading the Daily Prophet with Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as someone Sirius is concerned about being attacked.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Crouch wanted to see.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that carries Sirius' letter.

relationships.description: Sirius warns Harry about being in danger and tells him not to walk off into the forest with anyone else at night.
Harry walked off into the forest with Viktor Krum.
